entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}I went outside to relieve myself and{F801}saw that the sky over Kiccigiorgi was{F801}bright red...{F801}{F802}I talked with the young lad who was with{F801}you on the day of the Rite.{F801}{F802}He said he was from Kiccigiorgi. I hope{F801}he was all right...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}They called it a festival, so you can{F801}imagine my surprise to find myself at{F801}an execution.{F801}{F802}According to the Monastery, there are{F801}demons in this kingdom? And an evildoer{F801}changing people into demons...?{F801}{F802}Well, all's well that ends well, eh?{F801}Nothing will change for us, right...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}They called it a festival, so you can{F801}imagine my surprise to find myself at{F801}an execution.{F801}{F802}According to the Monastery, there are{F801}demons in this kingdom? And an evildoer{F801}changing people into demons...?{F801}{F802}Well, all's well that ends well, eh?{F801}Nothing will change for us, right...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Hoy, did you hear? There was no fire at{F801}Kiccigiorgi... it was a demon attack!{F801}{F802}The Monastery is playing the Casualries{F801}for fools! They keep us ignorant for{F801}their own purposes!{F801}{F802}Well, from now on, the kingdom's under{F801}new management. So all's well that{F801}ends well.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Hoy, did you hear? There was no fire at{F801}Kiccigiorgi... it was a demon attack!{F801}{F802}The Monastery is playing the Casualries{F801}for fools! They keep us ignorant for{F801}their own purposes!{F801}{F802}Well, from now on, the kingdom's under{F801}new management. So all's well that{F801}ends well.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}I learned from the new leaders that{F801}demons are no simple fairy-stories...{F801}{F802}Under the new leadership, the Monastery{F801}has brought everything to light.{F801}{F802}Thank you for all you did on our behalf{F801}while we labored in darkness...{F801}Blessed Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}I learned from the new leaders that{F801}demons are no simple fairy-stories...{F801}{F802}Under the new leadership, the Monastery{F801}has brought everything to light.{F801}{F802}Thank you for all you did on our behalf{F801}while we labored in darkness...{F801}Blessed Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Supposedly, the Monastery was ordered{F801}by our new leaders to tell us everything.{F801}{F802}Demons aren't fairy-stories at all.{F801}You've been fighting this whole time{F801}while we toiled in darkness, yes?{F801}{F802}This may be a bit late in coming...{F801}but thank you, Blessed Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Supposedly, the Monastery was ordered{F801}by our new leaders to tell us everything.{F801}{F802}Demons aren't fairy-stories at all.{F801}You've been fighting this whole time{F801}while we toiled in darkness, yes?{F801}{F802}This may be a bit late in coming...{F801}but thank you, Blessed Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}It's thanks to the Luxurors that we in{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado can live{F801}in peace.{F801}{F802}King Ahazuya of Mikado and the monks of{F801}the Monastery... I pray every day in the{F801}castle's direction to show my thanks.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}It's thanks to the Luxurors that we in{F801}the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado can live{F801}in peace.{F801}{F802}King Ahazuya of Mikado and the monks of{F801}the Monastery... I pray every day in the{F801}castle's direction to show my thanks.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}I don't recall who told me this... but{F801}supposedly, demons are indeed real.{F801}{F802}But in any case, we have the Luxurors{F801}with us.{F801}{F802}I'm sure I don't know what they would{F801}do for us exactly, but I'm sure it{F801}would keep us safe!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}E-Erm, demons aren't truly real, are{F801}they? I'll grant you that everyone has{F801}been talking about them...{F801}{F802}And that rare disease that turns humans{F801}into frightful creatures cropping up{F801}in the west of the kingdom...{F801}{F802}Pray, what are the Luxurors doing about{F801}this? We will be safe, no...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}E-Erm, demons aren't truly real, are{F801}they? We will be safe, no...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403312}I'm dreadfully glad that the Black{F801}Samurai has been executed...{F801}{F802}Praise be to the Samurai and Monastery{F801}who brought this about!{F801}{F802}I knew that we could trust our Luxurors.{F801}They always have our interests at heart,{F801}bless them...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403312}I'm dreadfully glad that the Black{F801}Samurai has been executed...{F801}{F802}Praise be to the Samurai and Monastery{F801}who brought this about!{F801}{F802}I knew that we could trust our Luxurors.{F801}They always have our interests at heart,{F801}bless them...!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403312}I can't abide those Luxurors. To think{F801}that they were just using us...!{F801}{F802}They produce nothing, and yet they{F801}consume the food we bring to them...{F801}{F802}If our new leaders had not told us about{F801}this, we would have been their slaves{F801}until our dying day!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403312}I can't abide those Luxurors. To think{F801}that they were just using us...!{F801}{F802}They produce nothing, and yet they{F801}consume the food we bring to them...{F801}{F802}If our new leaders had not told us about{F801}this, we would have been their slaves{F801}until our dying day!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403344}Our new leaders have said that the food{F801}we produce is rightly ours.{F801}{F802}That alone makes life in the Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado easier on us. Praise{F801}be to God and our new leaders!{F801}{F802}May this ideal state of things last as{F801}long as it can...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403344}Our new leaders have said that the food{F801}we produce is rightly ours.{F801}{F802}That alone makes life in the Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado easier on us. Praise{F801}be to God and our new leaders!{F801}{F802}May this ideal state of things last as{F801}long as it can...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403344}The advent of our new leaders has made{F801}life in the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado{F801}much easier on us.{F801}{F802}But this new world the Blessed Samurai{F801}coax us to, even if it means discarding{F801}all of that...{F801}{F802}I'm anxious about departing on such a{F801}journey... but my faith in the Samurai{F801}will not waver now!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403344}The advent of our new leaders has made{F801}life in the Eastern Kingdom of Mikado{F801}much easier on us.{F801}{F802}But this new world the Blessed Samurai{F801}coax us to, even if it means discarding{F801}all of that...{F801}{F802}I'm anxious about departing on such a{F801}journey... but my faith in the Samurai{F801}will not waver now!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-311}{F813,1,411007}I swear, the people in this country...{F801}Are they nuts!? C'mon, look at me!{F801}I'm a frickin' demon, y'know?{F801}{F802}But all they do when they see me is{F801}scream and whimper God's name. They{F801}don't even try to run!{F801}{F802}And that ain't no fun at all! The{F801}thrill of the hunt is in the chase!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-311}{F813,1,411007}I swear, the people in this country...{F801}Are they nuts!? entry.source: {F812}Guiding Samurai\0{F87A,117}{F813,1,403002}There are some who are opposed to the{F801}idea of moving to a new land...{F801}{F802}But all it took was the mention of{F801}your name to convince them and stop{F801}their grumbling.{F801}{F802}It crossed my mind at such times that{F801}God is a necessary evil to keep the{F801}people in line... {F801}
entry.target: {F812}Guiding Samurai\0{F87A,117}{F813,1,403002}There are some who are opposed to the{F801}idea of moving to a new land...{F801}{F802}But all it took was the mention of{F801}your name to convince them and stop{F801}their grumbling.{F801}{F802}It crossed my mind at such times that{F801}God is a necessary evil to keep the{F801}people in line... {F801}

entry.source: {F812}Patrolling Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403042}We considered bringing the pigs along{F801}with us to Tokyo...{F801}{F802}But in the end, we had to preserve most{F801}of them in salt and let the people{F801}bring them that way.{F801}{F802}They made the ultimate sacrifice for us.{F801}It reminds us how precarious our{F801}situation is.{F801}{F802}We must not forget all that. We must{F801}stay humble in the new world...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Patrolling Samurai\0{F87A,116}{F813,1,403042}We considered bringing the pigs along{F801}with us to Tokyo...{F801}{F802}But in the end, we had to preserve most{F801}of them in salt and let the people{F801}bring them that way.{F801}{F802}They made the ultimate sacrifice for us.{F801}It reminds us how precarious our{F801}situation is.{F801}{F802}We must not forget all that. entry.source: {F812}Simple man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403222}The Monastery has forbidden us to read{F801}books. They say it is to prevent them{F801}from hindering our work.{F801}{F802}But if they are no hindrance, then I{F801}must assume it's fine. I see no need{F801}to stop reading books.{F801}{F802}If they mean to forbid something, they{F801}should look to those layabout Luxurors{F801}first...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simple man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403222}Ah, dear me... This "Paradise Lost"{F801}I got from the Black Samurai is too{F801}fascinating!{F801}{F802}It's about a fallen angel, cast out from{F801}Paradise for choosing freedom over{F801}serving his creator.{F801}{F802}I never considered the idea that my life{F801}might belong to me. No one ever suggested{F801}anything like it all this time...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Kiccigiorgi's in a terrible state...{F801}{F802}The whole village and the parts around{F801}it are quarantined. entry.source: {F812}Frugal woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}That rare disease which turns people to{F801}demons is becoming less rare. It seems{F801}to have had its start in Kiccigiorgi.{F801}{F802}I hear that's why the Monastery made{F801}the decision to burn the village down.{F801}{F802}E-Erm, our home will be safe, no? I mean,{F801}the Luxurors are working at it, surely?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Simple man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403222}There was a message from the Monastery.{F801}It seems there's to be a gathering at{F801}the castle today.{F801}{F802}And just as my mystery novel was{F801}becoming exciting...{F801}{F802}But it'll make trouble for me if I don't{F801}go. I suppose I can show my face there{F801}and then slip out quietly.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Reeking man\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403032}Looks like a festival today. Isn't that{F801}a bit cheeky at a time like this?{F801}{F802}There's Kiccigiorgi folk who still{F801}don't have roofs over their heads...{F801}
